examples.text: I want my pink shirt back!
They were real that time I wore a vest! That vest was disgusting!

I would like to put you on hold
Give me a few minutes to get together

intents.description: Indicate a delay in providing input to the bot.

examples.text: That is precisely what I was looking for
Affirmative. That's what I'm looking for.

intents.description: Acknowledge that the response satisfies a question.

examples.text: I have no idea what you are looking for
I don t know what you need
I don t know what you want
To be honest, I m really not sure
I m not sure what will make you happy
I m not certain I get what you re saying

intents.description: Indicate no definite answer to a question.

examples.text: Let's go back to square one
Let's pick this up from the top again.
One more time from the beginning
We will need to begin again
I want start from the beginning
I would like to start all over
What do you mean by that?
I didn't quite understand what you said
I don't understand what you're saying
Let's try to say that again more clearly, shall we?
Can you say that again please?
I did not quite understand what you gave me
I didn't mean to do that actually, let's go back
Wait! Let's back up few steps and do that again
Hold on! I think I want to do it differently.

intents.description: Ask the bot to take one step back.

examples.text: Don't have sex. Don't have sex in the missionary position, don't have sex standing up, Kids, don't have sex.
This is Susan from Planned Parenthood, I have her test results. If you could have her call me as soon as she can. It’s urgent. Thank you.
Do NOT have sex.. Because if do, WILL get pregnant... And DIE!! Do not have sex in the missionary position, do not have sex standing up, okay? Promise? Okay good, now everyone take some rubbers.
One time, she punched me in the face. It was awesome.
Gretchen, I’m sorry I laughed at you that time you got diarrhea at Barnes & Nobles. And I’m sorry for telling everyone about it. And I’m sorry for repeating it now.
I have this theory, that if you cut off all her hair she’d look like a British man.
Can I get you guys anything? Some snacks? A condom? Let me know! Oh, God love ya.
It’s like I have ESPN or something. My breasts can always tell when it’s going to rain. Well…they can tell when it’s raining.
You can go shave your back now

have a nephew named Anfernee, and I know how mad he gets when I call him Anthony. Almost as mad as I get when I think about the fact that my sister named him Anfernee.

Why are you so obsessed with me?

I’m not a regular mom, I’m a cool mom.
Gretchen, I’m sorry I laughed at you that time you got diarrhea at Barnes & Nobles. And I’m sorry for telling everyone about it. And I’m sorry for repeating it now.

I guess it’s probably because I’ve got a big lesbian crush on you! Suck on that.

Why should Caesar get to stomp around like a giant, while the rest of us try not to get smushed under his big feet? What’s so great about Caesar? Hmm? Brutus is just as cute as Caesar. Brutus is just as smart as Caesar. People totally like Brutus just as much as they like Caesar. And when did it become okay for one person to be the boss of everybody, huh? Because that’s not what Rome is about. We should totally just stab Caesar!

If only you knew how mean she really is, you’d know that I’m not allowed to wear hoop earrings, right? Yeah, two years ago she told me hoops earrings were her thing, and I wasn’t allowed to wear them anymore. And then for Hanukkah my parents got this pair of really expensive white gold hoops and I had to pretend like I didn’t even like them. It was so sad.
'Cause she’s a life ruiner. She ruins people’s lives.
Trang Pak made out with Coach Carr?
I don’t think that my father, the inventor of Toaster Strudel, would be too pleased to hear about this.
I'm sorry that everyone is so jealous of me... but I can't help it that I'm popular
Oh my God, he's your cousin! Yeah, but he's my FIRST cousin...
Coach Carr makes us eat those when  we wanna move up a weight class.
Made out with a hot dog? Oh my God that was one time!
I wish we could all get along like we used to in middle school. I wish I could bake a cake filled with rainbows and smiles and everyone would eat and be happy.
I can’t go to Taco Bell. I’m on an all-carb diet. God, Karen, you are so stupid!
Why are you eating a Kälteen bar?
They make you gain weight like crazy.
Everyone in Africa can read Swedish.
Oh my God, Danny DeVito! I love your work!

O my God Karen! You can't just ask people why they are white!
Raise your hand if you have ever been personally victimized by Regina George.
That’s why her hair is so big. It’s full of secrets.
Did you see nipple? It only counts if you saw a nipple!
You smell like a baby prostitute.
I hear she does car commercials…in Japan.

intents.description: Indicate the bot's response does not address a question.

examples.text: Speak to me if you are there.
Did you hear what I said?
Are you still here with me?

intents.description: Ask the bot to indicate that it is available.

values: Get in loser. We’re going shopping.
Life is full of risks anyway; why not take them? Lindsay Lohan
I don't care what anyone says. Lindsay Lohan
Never say never. The things that you don't plan are the best. I'm a very spontaneous person. Lindsay Lohan
Beauty is grace and confidence. I've learned to accept and appreciate what nature gave me. Lindsay Lohan
It's my body. And I like my body. And I like my breasts. And no, they're not fake. Lindsay Lohan
It's so weird that I went to rehab. I always said that I would die before I went to rehab. But I thought, 'I'm going to stay here tonight.' And I stayed there for a month. It was great.
I know that in my past I was young and irresponsible - but that's what growing up is. You learn from your mistakes.
Stop trying to make “fetch” happen, Gretchen!
There's a way of dealing with hardships that are healthier than going out. That's what I've learned. Lindsay Lohan
I want to get married before I'm 30. And I'd like to win an Oscar before then. Lindsay Lohan
Say 'no' more than 'yes,' and just make sure you surround yourself with good people. Lindsay Lohan
I'm an angel compared to some of my friends. Lindsay Lohan
My motto is: Live every day to the fullest - in moderation. Lindsay Lohan
I'm not going to deny the fact that I've tried pot. I hated it. Lindsay Lohan
When someone tells me not to do something, I'll do it more. Lindsay Lohan
There's been some girl-on-girl crime here.
Bye, Jason.
